author: pietjepuk
content:
I think you're misunderstanding the rules of transaction inclusion. Ever since EIP-1559, you can't include your own transactions for free [0]. You _have_ to pay the base fee (which is burned). 

[0] Note that including your own transactions was never really "free" even before EIP-1559, because it came at the cost of _not_ including some other transaction that paid you.
